body: Caribbean bloggers have their eyes on Cairo. From Bermuda, Wishful Thinking republishes an image that offers "hope for humanity"; Cuba's Yoani Sanchez says: "The insinuation is clear: five decades of authoritarianism here at home has exceeded its expiration date" and Trinidad-based Globewriter adds: "When you target journalists and shut down the internet you show only that you operate best in darkness."
original_body: Caribbean bloggers have their eyes on Cairo. From Bermuda, Wishful Thinking republishes an image that offers "hope for humanity"; Cuba's Yoani Sanchez says: "The insinuation is clear: five decades of authoritarianism here at home has exceeded its expiration date" and Trinidad-based Globewriter adds: "When you target journalists and shut down the internet you show only that you operate best in darkness."
title: Caribbean: Looking at Cairo
